mapper.select: select * from lecture order by l_no
select * from lecture where p_no = #{p_no} order by l_no
mapper.insert: insert into lecture( l_no, title, description, professor, category, p_no ) values(lecture_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{description}, #{professor}, #{category}, #{p_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE lecture SET category = #{category}, TITLE = #{title}, description = #{description} WHERE l_no = #{l_no}
mapper.select: select * from lecture where l_no in (select l_no from lectureBook where s_no = #{s_no})
select l.category, l.title, l.professor, e.s_no, e.e_no, e.description, e.regdate from lecture_evaluate e join lecture l on l.l_no in (select e.l_no from lecture_evaluate) order BY e.e_no desc
select l.category, l.title, l.professor, e.e_no, e.description, e.regdate from lecture_evaluate e join lecture l on l.l_no in (select e.l_no from lecture_evaluate) and e.e_no = #{e_no}

select l.category, l.title, l.professor, e.e_no, e.description, e.regdate from lecture_evaluate e join lecture l on l.l_no in (select e.l_no from lecture_evaluate) and ${category} like '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' order BY e.e_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into lecture_evaluate (e_no, l_no, s_no, description) values (evaluate_seq.nextval, #{l_no}, #{s_no}, #{description})
mapper.update: update lecture_evaluate SET description = #{description} where e_no = #{e_no}
mapper.select: select * from lecturebook join lecture on lecture.l_no = lecturebook.l_no and lecturebook.s_no = #{m_no} order by lecture.title
